page.title: 03Religion - continued
page.content: Also in Littlebourne is a very active United Reform Church served from Canterbury for Communion + by 2 Elders who lead the 2 services each Sunday. During the week there is a Womens Pleasant Hour, house groups for Bible study, videos, discussions and prayer. For children there are the Beavers and Crusaders. Ickham Church of St John has a shingled spire an interesting tomb + fine organ. Wickhambreux St Andrew has a tower + an avenue of pleached lime trees. They share a vicar but have their own choirs, organists + ringers. Ickham has two bells, Wickhambreux a peal. Services alternate. Proceeds are shared from the Christmas market held at Ickham and the Wickhambreux Summer fair. Soon one vicar will serve all the Parishes and Stodmarsh.
